item.title: Trump says tech leaders and mayor changed his mind about using federal force in San Francisco
item.description: <p>Despite CEO of Nvidia and San Francisco Mayor seemingly convincing Trump, the US President said he could change his mind if it &quot;doesn&#x27;t work out.&quot;</p>

item.title: Young girl dies following crash that left parents and four-year-old boy injured
item.description: <p>T﻿he 11-year-old girl died in hospital after a two-car collision in Melbourne&#x27;s east on Thursday.</p>

item.title: Older Aussies to be slugged more for at-home care from next week
item.description: <p>Aged care advocates fear an incoming sector shake-up means new fees for at-home assistance could force older Australians to cut out important services.</p>

item.title: Australian women's cricketers allegedly 'touched inappropriately' by man while on India tour
item.description: <p>Female players, who are in Indore for the ICC Women&#x27;s World Cup, were on their way to a café when they were allegedly &quot;approached and touched inappropriately&quot; by a man on a motorbike.</p>

item.title: SA premier's $500 million election pledge to unlock CBD housing stock
item.description: <p>Adelaide&#x27;s skyline could significantly change if a half-billion dollar election promise by the state&#x27;s premier comes to fruition.</p>

item.title: Bikie wanted by police in multiple states arrested after months on the run
item.description: <p>The high-profile underworld figure was arrested on the doorstep of a Sydney Airbnb after weeks on the run and a manhunt that spanned across two states.</p>

item.title: Woman seriously injured after driver allegedly asleep at the wheel ploughs into Sydney café customers
item.description: <p>CCTV showed the car mounting the curb in a heart-stopping moment as bystanders sprinted towards the car in a desperate attempt to stop it from hitting patrons.</p>

item.title: Toddler dies in Queensland police station foyer after horror car crash, believed to be a case of domestic viol
item.description: <p>Police say the tragedy is a case of domestic violence and are investigating whether the vehicle was driven off the road intentionally.</p>

item.title: Kamala Harris hints at another presidential run: 'I am not done'
item.description: <p>Harris marked her clearest indication yet that she might launch another presidential campaign in 2028.</p>

item.title: Could you fall in love with an AI chatbot? Many Aussies admit there's a chance - and young people are most at

item.title: Mum shares heartbreaking story as perinatal support service expands with new location
item.description: <p>Marcelle Cooper knew something was wrong when she looked down at her beautiful, giggling, baby and felt absolutely nothing.</p>

item.description: <p>“I think we have a really good chance of making a very comprehensive deal,” Trump told reporters travelling with him on Air Force One. </p>

item.title: Eric Edgar Cooke terrorised the city of Perth for years before he was caught and executed
item.description: <p>Over five years, Eric Edgar Cooke murdered at least eight people in opportunistic attacks, with no obvious common traits between the victims.</p>

item.title: Trump threatens Canada with 10 per cent extra import tax for not pulling down anti-tariffs ad sooner
item.description: <p>The US president said he plans to hike tariffs on imports of Canadian goods by an extra 10 per cent because of an anti-tariff television ad aired by the province of Ontario.</p>
